query:
SELECT
                a.id,
                a.owner_id,
                a.name,
                a.description,
                a.thumbnail_id,
                a.is_public,
                a.created_at,
                MIN(mi.taken_at_local) as "first_date?",
                MAX(mi.taken_at_local) as "last_date?"
            FROM album a
            LEFT JOIN album_media_item ami ON a.id = ami.album_id
            LEFT JOIN media_item mi ON ami.media_item_id = mi.id AND mi.deleted = false
            WHERE a.id = $1
            GROUP BY a.id
